name: tronc
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a system in which tips (= extra money that customers give) are collected together and shared out among all the staff in a restaurant: The head waiter will donate some of the money to the restaurant's tronc. His restaurants operate a tronc system and the service charge is shared among the staff.
More examplesFewer examplesThe company keeps only the 1 per cent it costs to process credit cards and run the tronc. We have a tronc system in place run by a member of staff.If a bill comes to £100, there is a discretionary service charge of £12.50. Of that, £10 goes to the company and £2.50 goes to the front of house via a tronc system.
